channel.title: In My Life: A Blog
channel.description: A simple, beautiful theme for Jekyll that emphasizes content rather than aesthetic fluff.

item.title: 3 Songs That Make Me REALLY Happy
item.description:
Clarry is my go to instrument. It’s great cause it’s such a versatile instrument and you can play a bunch of different things.

I present to you, my ultimate song list.

1) Solitude in E Minor


It’s a very beautiful song.

2) Kelpy G

Go on. Listen to this excellent six hour loop of Kelpy G while studying or working out, because it is super smooth.

3) Boys Who Cry

You can now exclusively listen to my version of It’s All About You & 4 Ply (ft. Pearl, Mr. Krabbs, and Boys Who Cry) It’s a banger.

Hope you liked this article, and these top class songs by the one and only, ME.

item.title: How I Cope with People Making Fun of my Nose
item.description:
You must be wondering how I’m still so concerned about people making fun of my nose having lived at the bikini bottom for who knows how many years. But every now and then, I feel really sad.

So I pull out Clarry. Clarry gives me peace. Solace. Tranquility. I don’t know where I would be without Clarry.

“And now, for some soothing sounds from Squidward’s clarinet. Thank you, thank you.” ~ me

Check out my article 5 Songs That REALLY Make Me Happy for some clarinet song suggestions.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog!
item.description:
Hi! I’m Squidward Tentacles from Bikini Bottom. I live on Conch street and I’m an aspiring clarinet player. I love to be as far away from SpongeBob and Patrick as I can! I work at Krusty Krab.

Read more
